name: SEAHORSE BAY TRIATHLON
description:
Post-human apocalypse, the polar ice caps have melted and a society of radioactive marine mutants rule the ocean on the only landmass.  Annually they hold a triathlon where athletes will swim, bike, and run along the most populated coast... 

Hello! This is my first table top game. It uses mostly coin flips and karma to progress through. I will release an improved version after this one has been tested.
